sentences.english: You can tell the very rich by their evening dress.
sentences.chinese: 你可从夜礼服认出那些极有钱的富人。

sentences.english: Has the special rich fragrance, the feeling in the mouth like abalone, extremely lubricates tastily .
sentences.chinese: 有特别的浓香，口感如鲍鱼，极润滑爽口。

sentences.english: Because Confucianism has intensively religious characteristic, so it is a very orbicular religion.
sentences.chinese: 因之具高度的宗教性，是极圆成的宗教。

sentences.english: Sam could not supply (to purchase) the camera he longed for for it was too expensive.
sentences.chinese: 萨姆买不起他极想要那种照相机，因为那相机太贵了。
这本书编得极有吸引力。

sentences.english: He has a keen impatience with the dull.
sentences.chinese: 他对于迟钝的人极不耐烦。

sentences.english: The runners set off at a pace.
sentences.chinese: 赛跑诌以极高的速度起跑。

sentences.english: Lounge patrons desperately wanted to imbibe the essence of all this.
sentences.chinese: 酒吧的老主顾们极欲将全部精华吸收殆尽。

sentences.english: LUPIT benefited from very high ocean heat content and intensification rate has been fast.
sentences.chinese: 受惠于极高海面热含量，卢碧增强的速度颇快。

sentences.english: Some materials such as Lotus leaves shed water because they are "superhydrophobic".
sentences.chinese: 有些材料如荷叶洒下水珠因为它是“极疏水的”。

sentences.english: It also provides management with an extremely valuable decision-making tool.
sentences.chinese: 这也为管理提供了极有价值的决策性手段。

sentences.english: They have more bottom end, a warmer, mellower mid and upper mid-range, and often more top octave.
sentences.chinese: 低端丰满，中频又温又纯，更经常在极高频段更出彩。

sentences.english: Application of quadrupole mass-spectrometer in the transfer system for photocathode manufacturing(PC) is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了四极质谱仪在光阴极转移系统中的应用。

sentences.english: It is a well written gatha with an excellent explanation.
sentences.chinese: 此篇连同解说都写得极出色。

sentences.english: Blind bit of test the waters with a bamboo pole and going very slow.
sentences.chinese: 盲人用竹竿点点探探，走得极缓慢。

sentences.english: Therefore, Q1 must withstand a gate-to-source voltage higher than this value.
sentences.chinese: 因此，Q1必须经受门源极电压高于这个值。
